author: alexp7
title: Token Allies, Latam Businesses
description: In LatinAmerica, It is very hard for businesses and start ups to get quick and easy access to funding, impeding many great ideas to be real.
solution: We aim to provide a platform where businesses and start ups from LATAM will be able to easily create, manage and sell their business tokens.
experience: 2 Argentinian partners. Been doing businesses in LATAM for many years, experienced in constrained situations. Catalyst active members.
